author: babaijit
title: Help needed for Chikhaldara trip
text: # 1 Hi All, I am going to Chikhaldara with my parents & wife. I will reachBadnera junction on 19-10-15 around 10.30 am via Geetanjali Express. 1) I want to know how we can reach Chikhaldara by public transport. 2) We don't book any hotel till now as I heard it will be off season at that time. Is it true? Will I get budget hotel there after reaching ? 3) Our return ticket is on 22-10-15 from badnera by Geetanjali Exp. Please tell how we can do sightseeing between these days. Is jungle safari possible from Chikhaldara at that time? Thanks in advance!
